name: jingle
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to make a repeated gentle ringing sound, or to make things do this: She waited for him by the car, jingling the keys in her hand. The coins jingled in her pocket as she walked along.

jingle noun
(TUNE)
[ C ] a short simple tune, often with words, that is easy to remember and is used to advertise a product on the radio or television

jingle verb [I/T]
(RING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
to make a repeated gentle ringing sound, or to cause an object to make a ringing sound: [ T ] He jingled the coins in his pocket.
jingle noun
(TUNE)
[ C ] a short, simple tune, often with words, that is easy to remember and is used to advertise a product on radio or television
Add to word list
Add to word list
a short tune or song used to advertise a product on television or the radio: She is one of America's most successful commercial jingle writers.
